# AVSampleBufferAudioRendererFlushTimeKey

**Global Variable**

The key that indicates the presentation timestamp of the first queued sample that was flushed.

## Declaration

```swift
let AVSampleBufferAudioRendererFlushTimeKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] object that wraps a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime] value.

## Removing queued buffers

- **flush(fromSourceTime:completionHandler:)**: Flushes queued sample buffers with presentation time stamps later than or equal to the specified time.
